definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: squeeze, press, fig. oppress (Ar. lah.=as.a; Chr.-Pal. lh.s. Schwally:Idioticon 48 (with which Nö:M74 comp. Mand. [[הלאחא]], torture, NS. h.oles. press together, urge, exert oneself); see also rare deriv. in Syr. PS:1932);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. ´[[ל]] Ju Jdg 4:3 + 2 t. etc.; Impf. sf. [[יִלְחָחֵנִי]] Ps 56:2; 3 fs. [[וַתִּלְחַץ]] Nu 22:25, etc.; Pt. pl. [[לֽחֲחִים]] Ex 3:9 + 2 t., etc.—
squeeze, press: sq. acc. + [[אֶל]] Ju Jdg 1:34, Nu 22:25 (J); sq. acc. + [[בְּ]] instr. 2Ki 6:32 shut the door and press him (back, out) with the door.

oppress: sq. acc. pers. Ex 22:20 ((‖[[הוֹנָה ]]), Ex 23:29 (both E), Ps 56:2; of people Ex 3:9 (E; + acc. cogn.), Ju Jdg 2:18, Jdg 4:3, Jdg 6:9, Jdg 10:12, 1Sa 10:18, Am 6:14, 2Ki 13:4, 2Ki 13:22, Je 30:20, Ps 106:42; abs. Is 19:20

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 fs. [[וַתִּלָּחֵץֶ]] Nu 22:25 (J) squeeze oneself, of Balaam's ass, sq. [[אל־הַקִּיר]].
